name: Red and Blue
description:
Red and Blue is a groundbreaking strategy card game by Brilliant Games and Hex Entertainment (creators of Hex: Shards of Fate).



- COLLECT +750 CARDS TO BUILD YOUR OWN DECKS. Endless possibilities for crushing your opponents with powerful combos and strategies!

- CREATE DYNAMIC ELEMENTAL BATTLEFIELDS. Build and level the three areas of your board to activate increasingly powerful abilities.

- ENSNARE YOUR OPPONENTS, BUFF YOUR CREATURES. Use cleverly your Traps and Artifacts, two types of special cards tied to your elemental battlefields.

- THRILLING COMBAT, FAST-PACED FUN. Combat-focused gameplay mixed with traditional strategy card games features. Intuitive gameplay for newcomers, strategic depth for experts!
